PHRASE.LANG: Ride the jet exhausts preferred by Worm Guys everywhere! If you gotta go, why not fly there? Locomotion inspired by Men in Black™ III and the video game Men in Black: Alien Crisis™ [#Legal]
Déplacez-vous avec ces réacteurs d' avion préférés des Worm Guys ! Si vous devez partir, pourquoi ne pas voler avec ça? [#Legal]
Fliege mit dem Düsenmobil, das Worm Guys auf der ganzen Welt lieben! Wenn du mal wohin musst, warum fliegst du dann nicht hin? [#Legal]
Sfreccia sui gas di scarico preferiti dai vermoni! Se devi andare da qualche parte, perché non farlo volando? [#Legal]
¡Móntate en el jet que tanto les gusta a los gusanos! Si tienes que ir a alguna parte, ¿por qué no vas volando? [#Legal]
Ride the jet exhausts preferred by Worm Guys everywhere! If you gotta go, why not fly there? Locomotion inspired by Men in Black™ III and the video game Men in Black: Alien Crisis™ [#Legal]
Ride the jet exhausts preferred by Worm Guys everywhere! If you gotta go, why not fly there? Locomotion inspired by Men in Black™ III and the video game Men in Black: Alien Crisis™ [#Legal]
